content: madebym ka everlasting headband pattern introduction this is a vintage styled head band with ties around the head it can be tied in front of the neck over or under the hair in the back it is knitted in simple stockinette stitch with ribbing on both sides parts include the ties ribbing and main head piece are all adjustable this pattern is perfect for knitters who have learned the basic knit and purl and want to advance in learning simple increase and decrease techniques used long tail cast on bind off kfb knit into the front loop of the first stitch without sliding the stitch off the left-hand needle knit into the back of the same stitch slide the stitch off the left-hand needle k2tog knit into the front loops of two stitches p2tog purl into the front loops of two stitches materials 80-90 meters / 87-98 yards of dk yarn 4 5mm / us 7 knitting needles flat or circular for reference i used about 90 meters of daiso glitter veil 37% acrylic 28% polyester 26% nylon 9% metallic and 6% wool i suggest cotton yarn for a summer version and wool yarn for colder weather a fluffy yarn would result in a similar finished object as mine gauge 10 5 sts = 5 cm / 2 inches in stockinette stitch using 4 5mm / us 7 needles to check gauge knit a square in stockinette stitch and measure the number of stitches in 5cm / 2 inches if you have less stitches than 10 5 try smaller needles if you have more stitches than 10 5 try bigger needles finished measurements ties 30 cm / 11 8 inches long 2 cm / 0 8 inches wide ribbing 7 cm / 2 7 inches long main head piece 50 cm / 29 6 inches long including ribbing these are just suggestions you can adjust the number of row to attain your preferred length 1 abbreviations co cast on k knit kfb knit front back k2tog knit 2 together p purl p2tog purl 2 together st s stitch es instructions co 5 sts with long tail cast on 4 5mm / us 7 needles k all row for 30cm row 1 kfb to end 10 sts row 2 *k1 kfb* to two sts before the end k2 14sts row 3 *k2 p2* to end row 4 *p2 k2* to end repeat row 3&4 twice 4 row total row 5 *k1 kfb p2* three times k1 kfb 18 sts row 6 *p3 k1 kfb* three times p3 21 sts row 7 *k3 p3* to end row 8 *p3 k3* to end repeat row 7&8 eight times 16 row total row 9 k all row 10 k2 p17 k2 repeat row 9&10 for 34cm row 11 *k3 p3* to end row 12 *p3 k3* to end repeat row 11&12 eight times 16 row total row 13 *k1 k2tog p3* three times k3 18 sts row 14 p1 p2tog k1 k2tog *p2 k1
